title: Oscilloscope
description: Un oscilloscope, ou oscillographe, est un instrument de mesure destiné à visualiser une forme d'onde et un signal électrique, le plus souvent variable au cours du temps. Il permet d'observer les variations temporelles, soit de tensions électriques, soit de diverses autres grandeurs physiques préalablement transformées en tension au moyen de convertisseurs adaptés ou de capteurs.

title: Sharp PC-1251 Datasheet
description: A complete archive of all there is to know about the Sharp-PC 1251 pocket computer.

title: Vaporisateur Lampe pression réparation 101.
description: Un guide complet sur comment refaire un vaporisateur Bialadin/Vapalux/Tilley sans materiel spécial.

title: Alors, j'ai un Ibm 360.
post: J’ai trouvé un IBM 360, comme ci, comme ça à restaurer. Que-ce que je fais ?

Wow la dinguerie, c'est incroyable ! Mais comment t'as fait pour avoir une tel machine, et surtout dans cet état, parce que franchement, les gens on un peu trop tendance à laisser ces magnifiques machines pourrir dans un hangar à prendre la poussière, voir à les démenteler. Et puis comment t'as fait pour la ramener sans l'endomager, j'image que ça n'a pas été facile. Je suis vraiment curieux de savoir comment ce projet va évoluer car ...

title: Introduction to Python Programming
description: Learn the basics of Python programming, covering variables, loops, functions, and data structures.

title: Atari 2600 Manual
description: Complete manual for the classic Atari 2600 gaming console.

title: Repairing a Vintage Tube Amplifier
description: Step-by-step guide to restoring a vintage tube amplifier to its former glory.

title: Found an old vintage camera!
post: I found a 1950s vintage camera in my grandfather's attic. Does anyone know how I can start restoring it?

It's great that you found it! To restore a camera from the 50s, you should first check the lens and clean the glass. Be careful with the film compartment, it might be jammed. Let me know if you need a guide.

title: Digital Signal Processing
description: An introduction to digital signal processing, its applications in audio, image processing, and telecommunications.

title: Commodore 64 Programming Manual
description: A complete guide for programming the Commodore 64 in BASIC.

title: Building Your Own Raspberry Pi
description: Learn how to build and configure a Raspberry Pi for a variety of projects.

title: Fixing a Broken Hard Drive
post: I have a hard drive that's making strange noises. Is it possible to fix it myself, or should I send it to a professional?
It depends on the issue. If it's the motor, it's hard to fix. But if it's just a problem with the circuit board, you might be able to repair it yourself with the right tools.

title: Introduction to 3D Printing
description: A beginner's guide to 3D printing, including the basics of different printing technologies and their applications.

title: Apple IIe User Manual
description: Complete user manual for the Apple IIe personal computer.

title: DIY Arduino Projects for Beginners
description: Learn how to build simple Arduino projects, perfect for beginners.

title: Restoring a Vintage Typewriter
post: I just bought an old typewriter and I want to restore it. Does anyone have any experience with this?
You should clean the key mechanisms first and check for any rust. The typewriter might need some lubrication too. Be careful with the ribbon, it's often hard to replace.

title: Exploring Quantum Computing
description: An introduction to quantum computing and its potential impact on the future of technology.

title: Vintage Radio Restoration
description: Comprehensive archive on restoring vintage radios, including troubleshooting and parts replacement.

title: How to Create Your Own Website
description: Step-by-step guide on how to build a website from scratch using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Restoring a Classic Motorcycle
post: I have an old motorcycle from the 1970s that I want to restore. Any tips or guides out there?
First thing you need to do is check the engine and make sure it's not seized. Clean the carburetor and inspect the frame for any cracks. Good luck!

title: The Rise of Artificial Intelligence

description: An extensive archive detailing the history of personal computers, from the early models to modern-day devices.

title: DIY Home Automation with ESP8266
description: A guide to building home automation projects using the ESP8266 microcontroller.

title: Restoring a Vintage Boat
post: I bought an old wooden boat and I'm looking for advice on restoring it. Anyone here with experience?
You'll need to check the hull for rot, and the engine will probably need a lot of work. I recommend stripping down the paint and resealing everything.

title: The Future of Space Exploration
description: Exploring the future of space exploration, from the Mars mission to private space companies.
